title: Whole-Brain Learning Approach for Strengthening Information Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and College-Level Fundamental Mathematics Knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners with practical experience in interpreting mathematical data as current professionals, conducting studies in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment.

learning_goals: Learners can judge the reliability of mathematical data with over 80% accuracy by applying an information evaluation framework.
Learners can share information search strategies with peers and exchange feedback three or more times using collaborative tools within an LMS (Learning Management System).
Learners can complete a project systematically organizing complex mathematical information using whole-brain learning techniques (visualization, concept mapping, etc.).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
